ComicInfo.Title: Four On the Floor Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
SIBLING RIVALS!
Newly minted big sister Laura Kinney goes toe-to-toe with Tumblr's favorite big brother, Robbie Reyes!
Plus: Gabe versus Gabby!
Hey, uh, is anybody gonna stop the giant purple alien rampaging through southern California?
